Html:
I've been trying to get this module working for some time now - but nomatter what I do it wont index my site.

The TEMP/ExamineIndexes/FullText is created, but nothing is created in the DB

Also, when running a a search, I get an error on line 300 in FullTextSearch.XSLT

<xsl:variable name="results" select="fulltextsearch.search:Search($queryType,$searchTerms,$titleProperties,$bodyProperties,$rootNodes,$titleLinkProperties,$summaryProperties,$contextHighlighting,$summaryLength,$pageNumber,$pageLength,$fuzzyness,$useWildcards)"  />

with the text: 

"An error occurred during a call to extension function 'Search'. See InnerException for a complete description of the error."

Can anyone point me in the right direction - what I might be doing wrong, or how to fix it?

Using Umbraco 4.7

So, I got it working.

It was Visual Studio acting up, had to check .exa and .lck out for edit.

 

/TEMP/ExamineIndexes/Fullsearch/server.exa & .lck

 

Worked like a charm after that :)
